text: @WhiteHouse My personal feeling this enemy “Coronavirus” is not going away, we just need to figure out how we can go about American Business and for it not to detour us. It has became a pest, we need to get on with our lives and to know it out there but not to change our business course. https://t.co/BlY4VqJWTC
